channel.title: Having a little trouble... someone help im new :(
channel.description:
what i did was... i went into shops.CFG... and just above [ENDOFSHOPLIST] u see im making a shop.... i typed the name of the shop i put POT SHOP. i put in all the stuff.... like in item.. the item of the pot... amount 100... and did it to all the pots i wanted in the shop....i saved... copmiled.... runserver.... logged on... then i discovered my problem.
i logged on for about 2 seconds....( speaking to my mates on msn ) they started to say WTF?!!!?! whats happening dude!?!?!?!?.... im like huh? what??.... then "I"! discovered... that i connection lost.... so i reset the server...
logged on for 2 seconds again, connection lost....
logged on once more for a check... connection lost once aagain -.-!!!!! so i deleted the shop i made.... and everything was working perfectly.... so can anyone be bothered... to answer my question!

item.description:
@dylan1 wrote:

yea i forgot to tell you that also just search for the shops in your client and just copy 1 of the codes and change it to work on your shop (its preaty self explanitory after you see the code)

item.title: Having a little trouble... someone help im new :(
item.dc:creator: @1m_3m0 1m 3m0
item.description:
@1m_3m0 wrote:

to put a shop in you also have to add it in the client.java theres tuts on how to do it in the tut section, but basicly the information in client.java about ur shop is what number it is and the coords of where it is…

Read full topic

item.title: Having a little trouble... someone help im new :(
item.dc:creator: @dylan1 dylan1
item.description:
@dylan1 wrote:

shop = 40	Herb_Seed_Shop					2	2	5291	10000

it should look very similar to that and it would help alot if you told us the error you got when you compiled and what source you were using

Read full topic
